introduction: Tauri is turning 18 tomorrow. Tauri doesn't really care about his birthday, but his friends Kerli, Berit and Sten still want to celebrate it. Upon arrival to his doorstep, Tauri finds a package with a message: “Don't open until you're 18”. Tauri goes inside, eats, watches TV and falls asleep. At midnight, the package starts ringing, but the surprises are not over yet...
